body:
Hey guys! I know I already have a video hub thing, but since this is not related to gaming at all I've decided to make this post. Pretty much I will be switching the video below every time I do a "In Real Life Vlog" (not daily but a new series of mine) and bump the post so everyone knows :D
Hope you guys enjoy! :)

Newest Video: MLGPorky's Intro
